TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebBrowser extends System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserBase

summary.span: 讓使用者巡覽表單中的網頁。

span.span: Enables the user to navigate Web pages inside your form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可讓您主機的網頁和 Windows Forms 應用程式中的其他瀏覽器啟用文件。The control lets you host Web pages and other browser-enabled documents in your Windows Forms applications. 您可以使用控制，例如，提供整合式的 HTML 為基礎的使用者協助或 Web 應用程式中的瀏覽功能。You can use the control, for example, to provide integrated HTML-based user assistance or Web browsing capabilities in your application. 此外，您可以使用將現有的 Web 型控制項新增至用戶端應用程式 Windows Form 控制項。Additionally, you can use the control to add your existing Web-based controls to your Windows Forms client applications. > [!IMPORTANT] > 控制項是需要大量資源。The control is resource-intensive. 請務必呼叫方法，當您完成使用控制項，以確保能夠及時並釋出所有資源。Be sure to call the method when you are finished using the control to ensure that all resources are released in a timely fashion. 您必須呼叫附加的事件，應該一律是訊息的同一個執行緒或使用者介面 (UI) 執行緒上的方法。You must call the method on the same thread that attached the events, which should always be the message or user-interface (UI) thread. 控制項無法供部分信任程式碼。The control cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). 控制項有數個屬性、 方法和瀏覽與相關的事件。The control has several properties, methods, and events related to navigation. 下列成員，可讓您將控制項巡覽至特定 URL、 向後移動向前巡覽記錄的清單，以及載入首頁和搜尋目前使用者 頁面：The following members let you navigate the control to a specific URL, move backward and forward through the navigation history list, and load the home page and search page of the current user: - - - - - - 如果巡覽失敗時，會顯示頁面，指出發生問題。If the navigation is unsuccessful, a page indicating the problem is displayed. 瀏覽與任何這些成員原因， ，和事件發生的不同階段瀏覽。Navigation with any of these members causes the , , and events to occur at different stages of navigation. 這些和其他成員，例如和方法，可讓您在 Internet Explorer 中類似的應用程式中實作使用者介面控制項。These and other members, such as the and methods, let you implement user interface controls in your application similar to those in Internet Explorer. 即使您不想要顯示某些成員時才有用控制項在表單上的。Some members are useful even when you do not want to display the control on your form. 例如，您可以使用列印網頁的最新版本，而不會向使用者顯示頁面的方法。For example, you can use the method to print the latest version of a Web page without displaying the page to the user. 控制項也可讓您顯示您建立應用程式中，或您從資料庫或資源檔擷取的內容。The control also lets you display content that you create in your application or you retrieve from a database or resource file. 使用或屬性來取得或設定目前文件的內容當做字串或資料流。Use the or property to get or set the contents of the current document as a string or data stream. 您也可以管理的網頁內容屬性，其中包含存取 managed HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 目前頁面的物件。You can also manipulate the contents of a Web page through the property, which contains an object that provides managed access to the HTML document object model (DOM) for the current page. 搭配使用時，此屬性相當實用，屬性，在網頁上，讓您結合網頁控制項和 Windows Form 控制項中實作您的應用程式程式碼和動態 HTML (DHTML) 程式碼之間的雙向通訊單一使用者介面。This property is useful, when used in combination with the property, to implement two-way communication between your application code and dynamic HTML (DHTML) code in a Web page, letting you combine Web-based controls and Windows Forms controls in a single user interface. 您可以使用從您的應用程式呼叫指令碼的程式碼方法的屬性。You can use the property to call scripting code methods from your application. 指令碼程式碼可以存取您的應用程式，透過`window.external`物件，它是供主機存取的內建 DOM 物件和其對應至您指定的物件屬性。Your scripting code can access your application through the `window.external` object, which is a built-in DOM object provided for host access, and which maps to the object that you specify for the property. 控制項是 ActiveX 的 managed 包裝函式[WebBrowser 控制項](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198812)，並使用使用者的電腦上安裝任何版本的控制項。The control is a managed wrapper for the ActiveX [WebBrowser control](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198812), and uses whichever version of the control is installed on the user's computer. > [!NOTE] > 此類別可讓類別層級的安全性要求。This class makes security demands at the class level. A衍生的類別或呼叫堆疊中的任何呼叫端沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when a derived class or any caller in the call stack does not have full trust permission. 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[繼承要求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). > [!NOTE] > 類別只可以用於設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒。The class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode. 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為屬性。To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作與使用 [網址] 列控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to implement an address bar for use with the control. 這個範例需要您有包含表單的控制項稱為`webBrowser1`、控制項稱為`TextBoxAddress`，和控制項稱為`ButtonGo`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control called `webBrowser1`, a control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a control called `ButtonGo`. 當您在文字方塊中輸入的 URL 和按下 ENTER 或按一下**移** 按鈕，控制項巡覽至指定的 URL。When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the control navigates to the URL specified. 當您按一下超連結巡覽時，文字方塊中會自動更新以顯示目前的 URL。When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/VB/form1.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，控制項自動巡覽至已拖曳至其本身的文件。By default, the control automatically navigates to documents that are dropped onto it. 當您使用控制項做為一般的瀏覽器時，此行為是很有用。This behavior is useful when you use the control as a generic browser. 如果您使用控制項來顯示特別針對您的應用程式而設計的內容，例如 HTML 為基礎的使用者需協助，請設定屬性`false`以防止其他內容的顯示。If you use the control to display content designed specifically for your application, such as HTML-based user assistance, set the property to `false` to prevent the display of other content. 當您想要隱藏您使用的事實，這是特別有用控制項，例如若要建立緊密結合了網頁型的控制項，與 Windows Form 控制項的使用者介面。This is particularly useful when you want to conceal the fact that you are using the control, for example to create a user interface that seamlessly combines Web-based controls with Windows Forms controls. 您可以藉由設定停用其他標準瀏覽器功能和屬性`false`。You can disable other standard browser features by setting the and properties to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性與不相關屬性並不會造成拖放事件這類控制項中發生的事件。This property is not related to the property and does not cause drag-and-drop events such as the event to occur for the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 方法巡覽控制項加入此歷程記錄中的上一頁，如果有的話。The method navigates the control to the previous page in this history, if one is available. 使用屬性來判斷是否可瀏覽歷程記錄，同時包含前一頁。Use the property to determine whether navigation history is available and contains a previous page. 如果這個屬性是`true`、方法將會成功。If this property is `true`, the method will succeed. 否則，呼叫方法會傳回值為`false`，會發生任何的導覽。Otherwise, calling the method will return a value of `false` and no navigation will occur. 您也可以處理接收通知的事件時屬性變更。You can also handle the event to receive a notification when the property changes. 處理此事件很有用，例如，若要變更的啟用的狀態**回**按鈕時控制項巡覽至或離開巡覽記錄的開頭。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Back** button when the control navigates to or leaves the beginning of the navigation history. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來實作**回**按鈕類似的控制項**回**Internet Explorer 中的按鈕。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to implement a **Back** button for the control that is similar to the **Back** button in Internet Explorer. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和控制項稱為`backButton`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `backButton`. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 方法巡覽控制項加入此歷程記錄中的上一頁，如果有的話。The method navigates the control to the previous page in this history, if one is available. 屬性會指出是否可瀏覽歷程記錄，同時包含前一頁。The property indicates whether navigation history is available and contains a previous page. 處理接收通知的事件時屬性變更。Handle the event to receive a notification when the property changes. 處理此事件很有用，例如，若要變更的啟用的狀態**回**按鈕時控制項巡覽至或離開巡覽記錄的開頭。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Back** button when the control navigates to or leaves the beginning of the navigation history. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式事件以實作**回**按鈕類似的控制項**回**網際網路中的按鈕[總管]。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to implement a **Back** button for the control that is similar to the **Back** button in Internet Explorer. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和控制項稱為`backButton`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `backButton`. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 方法巡覽控制項加入這項記錄，到下一個頁面，如果有的話，因為先前的向後巡覽。The method navigates the control to the next page in this history, if one is available as a result of a previous backward navigation. 如果這個屬性是`true`、方法將會成功。If this property is `true`, the method will succeed. 否則，呼叫方法會傳回值為`false`，會發生任何的導覽。Otherwise, calling the method will return a value of `false` and no navigation will occur. 使用屬性來判斷是否巡覽記錄中有，並包含在目前頁面允許方法順利完成。Use the property to determine whether navigation history is available and contains a page located after the current one, allowing the method to succeed. 您也可以處理接收通知的事件時屬性變更。You can also handle the event to receive a notification when the property changes. 處理此事件很有用，例如，若要變更的啟用的狀態**向前**按鈕時控制項巡覽至或離開巡覽記錄的結尾。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Forward** button when the control navigates to or leaves the end of the navigation history. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式事件以實作**向前**按鈕類似的控制項**向前**按鈕Internet Explorer。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to implement a **Forward** button for the control that is similar to the **Forward** button in Internet Explorer. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和控制項稱為`ButtonForward`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonForward`. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會很有用，如果您很熟悉使用未受管理的 OLE 開發`WebBrowser`ActiveX 控制項，而且您想要擴充功能的 Windows Form控制項，這是 ActiveX 控制項的 managed 包裝函式。This method is useful if you are familiar with OLE development using the unmanaged `WebBrowser` ActiveX control and you want to extend the functionality of the Windows Forms control, which is a managed wrapper for the ActiveX control. 您可以使用此擴充來實作所未提供的包裝函式控制項的事件從 ActiveX 控制項。You can use this extensibility to implement events from the ActiveX control that are not provided by the wrapper control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何從衍生類別中的此方法使用，補充標準事件`NavigateError`來自 OLE 事件`DWebBrowserEvents2`介面。The following code example illustrates the use of this method in a class derived from that supplements the normal events with the `NavigateError` event from the OLE `DWebBrowserEvents2` interface. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會很有用，如果您很熟悉使用未受管理的 OLE 開發`WebBrowser`ActiveX 控制項，而且您想要擴充功能的 Windows Form控制項，這是 ActiveX 控制項的 managed 包裝函式。This method is useful if you are familiar with OLE development using the unmanaged `WebBrowser` ActiveX control and you want to extend the functionality of the Windows Forms control, which is a managed wrapper for the ActiveX control. 您可以使用此擴充性，例如，來自訂瀏覽器快顯功能表和快速鍵，或提供裝載的文件的自訂安全性設定。You can use this extensibility, for example, to customize the browser shortcut menu and shortcut keys or to provide a custom security configuration for hosted documents. 若要使用這項功能，實作繼承自類別和類別。To use this feature, implement classes that inherit from the and classes. 未受`WebBrowser`ActiveX 控制項會使用受保護方法來擷取所實作的擴充性介面類別。The unmanaged `WebBrowser` ActiveX control uses the protected method to retrieve extensibility interfaces implemented by the class. 覆寫方法以傳回自己的類別繼承自執行個體類別。Override the method to return an instance of your own class that inherits from the class. 類別會提供預設實作的 OLE`IDocHostUIHandler`介面。The class provides default implementations of the OLE `IDocHostUIHandler` interface. 您可以提供您自己的實作這個介面，或實作任何其他`WebBrowser`ActiveX 控制項介面，以自訂控制項的行為。You can provide your own implementation of this interface or implement any other `WebBrowser` ActiveX control interface in order to customize the behavior of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果您提供您自己的實作任何`IDocHostUIHandler`成員，您必須實作該介面的所有成員。If you provide your own implementation for any `IDocHostUIHandler` members, you must implement all the members of that interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性，當您想要存取中顯示的網頁內容透過 HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 的控制項。Use this property when you want to access the contents of a Web page displayed in the control through the HTML document object model (DOM). 例如，當您想要在 Windows Forms 應用程式中使用 Web 型控制項，這十分有用。This is useful, for example, when you want to use Web-based controls in your Windows Forms application. 您可以使用這個屬性，結合屬性，來實作中顯示的網頁之間的雙向通訊控制項和應用程式。You can use this property, in combination with the property, to implement two-way communication between a Web page displayed in the control and your application. 使用方法來呼叫在網頁從用戶端應用程式程式碼中實作之指令碼方法。Use the method to call script methods implemented in a Web page from your client application code. 指令碼程式碼可以存取您的應用程式，透過`window.external`物件，它是供主機存取的內建 DOM 物件和其對應至您指定的物件屬性。Your scripting code can access your application through the `window.external` object, which is a built-in DOM object provided for host access, and which maps to an object that you specify for the property. 若要存取的字串形式的網頁內容，請使用屬性。To access the contents of a Web page as a string, use the property. 若要存取的網頁內容，使用屬性。To access the contents of a Web page as a , use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性中的處理常式事件，以判斷是否已滿網頁表單。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in a handler for the event to determine whether a Web page form has been filled in. 如果輸入的欄位不會包含值，則會取消巡覽。If the input field does not contain a value, the navigation is canceled. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項巡覽至新的文件已設定其中一個的下列屬性或方法呼叫時：The control navigates to a new document whenever one of the following properties is set or methods is called: - - - - - - - - 處理新文件載入完畢時收到通知的事件。Handle the event to receive notification when the new document finishes loading. 當事件發生時，完全載入新文件，這表示您可以存取透過其內容， ，或屬性。When the event occurs, the new document is fully loaded, which means you can access its contents through the , , or property. 若要瀏覽開始之前，收到通知，處理事件。To receive notification before navigation begins, handle the event. 處理此事件可讓您取消巡覽，如果特定條件未符合，比方說，當使用者已無法完整填寫表單。Handling this event lets you cancel navigation if certain conditions have not been met, for example, when the user has not completely filled out a form. 處理接收通知的事件時完成瀏覽控制項，且已開始載入新的位置處的文件。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes navigation and has begun loading the document at the new location. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個事件，它完全載入後，列印文件。The following code example demonstrates the use of this event to print a document after it has fully loaded. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來載入到網頁控制項從物件。Use this property to load a Web page into the control from a object. 您可以從資料庫或資源檔載入網頁，例如，使用這個屬性。You can use this property, for example, to load Web pages from a database or resource file. 當您設定此屬性，控制項自動巡覽至相關： 空白 URL，然後再載入指定的文字。When you set this property, the control automatically navigates to the about:blank URL before loading the specified text. 這表示， ，和事件發生，當您設定這個屬性，以及值屬性不再有意義。This means that the , , and events occur when you set this property, and the value of the property is no longer meaningful. > [!NOTE] > 此屬性包含目前的文件的內容，即使已要求另一個文件。This property contains the contents of the current document, even if another document has been requested. 如果您設定這個屬性的值，然後立即擷取一次擷取的值可能會與設定如果的值不同控制何時未在時間來載入新的內容。If you set the value of this property and then immediately retrieve it again, the value retrieved may be different than the value set if the control has not had time to load the new content. 您可以擷取中的新值事件處理常式。You can retrieve the new value in a event handler. 若要存取的字串形式的網頁內容，請使用屬性。To access the contents of a Web page as a string, use the property. 您也可以透過存取使用 HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 的頁面內容屬性。You can also access the page contents using the HTML document object model (DOM) through the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中所顯示之網頁的 HTML 內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the HTML contents of the page displayed in the control.

value.span: 所顯示之網頁的 HTML 文字；如果未載入任何文件，則為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The HTML text of the displayed page, or the empty string ("") if no document is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性，當您想要管理的 HTML 網頁中顯示內容控制使用字串處理工具。Use this property when you want to manipulate the contents of an HTML page displayed in the control using string processing tools. 您可以使用這個屬性，例如，從資料庫載入頁面，或分析使用規則運算式的網頁。You can use this property, for example, to load pages from a database or to analyze pages using regular expressions. 當您設定此屬性，控制項自動巡覽至相關： 空白 URL，然後再載入指定的文字。When you set this property, the control automatically navigates to the about:blank URL before loading the specified text. 這表示， ，和事件發生，當您設定這個屬性，以及值屬性不再有意義。This means that the , , and events occur when you set this property, and the value of the property is no longer meaningful. > [!NOTE] > 此屬性包含目前的文件的文字，即使已要求另一個文件。This property contains the text of the current document, even if another document has been requested. 如果您設定這個屬性的值，然後立即擷取一次擷取的值可能會與設定如果的值不同控制何時未在時間來載入新的內容。If you set the value of this property and then immediately retrieve it again, the value retrieved may be different than the value set if the control has not had time to load the new content. 您可以擷取中的新值事件處理常式。You can retrieve the new value in a event handler. 或者，封鎖執行緒，直到呼叫載入文件方法中的迴圈，直到屬性會傳回原先要設定的值。Alternatively, you can block the thread until the document is loaded by calling the method in a loop until the property returns the value that you originally set it to. 若要存取的網頁內容，使用屬性。To access the contents of a Web page as a , use the property. 您也可以透過存取使用 HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 的頁面內容屬性。You can also access the page contents using the HTML document object model (DOM) through the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以程式設計方式顯示您所選擇的文件內容的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically display document content of your choosing. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`. summary.span: 取得目前在 控制項中顯示之文件的標題。

span.span: Gets the title of the document currently displayed in the control.

value.span: 目前文件的標題；如果未載入任何文件，則為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The title of the current document, or the empty string ("") if no document is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是很有用，例如，當您想要在應用程式的標題列中顯示文件標題。This property is useful, for example, when you want to display the document title in the title bar of the application. 如果已針對目前的文件定義沒有標題，此屬性設定為文件的位置和檔案名稱。If no title has been defined for the current document, this property is set to the document location and file name. 處理事件，以更新標題中的標題列時控制項巡覽至新的文件。Handle the event to update the title in the title bar when the control navigates to a new document. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用目前文件的標題以更新表單標題列的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to update the form title bar with the title of the current document. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). summary.span: 取得值，表示目前在 控制項中顯示之文件所使用的加密方法。

value.span: 其中一個 值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性與事件以實作類似 Internet Explorer 中的鎖定圖示應用程式的使用者介面中的指標。You can use this property with the event to implement an indicator in the user interface of your application similar to the lock icon in Internet Explorer. 當目前的文件未加密時，這個屬性的值會是。When the current document is not encrypted, the value of this property is . 當控制項會顯示包含多個具有不同的加密層級的內容框架的網頁，這個屬性的值是。When the control displays a Web page containing multiple frames with content of different encryption levels, the value of this property is . 未知的加密層級時，這個屬性的值是。When the encryption level is unknown, the value of this property is . 其他值則表示現有的加密類型。Other values indicate the type of encryption present. 若要模擬行為的 Internet Explorer 中的鎖定圖示，顯示的加密類型滑鼠指標停留在指標時，會出現在工具提示。To mimic the behavior of the lock icon in Internet Explorer, display the encryption type in a ToolTip that appears when the mouse pointer hovers over the indicator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個事件與屬性來實作類似 Internet Explorer 中的鎖定圖示應用程式的使用者介面中的指標。You can use this event with the property to implement an indicator in the user interface of your application similar to the lock icon in Internet Explorer. 在此事件處理常式中檢查的值屬性來判斷是否應該隱藏或顯示的指示器。In a handler for this event, check the value of the property to determine whether you should hide or display the indicator. 若要模擬 Internet Explorer 中的鎖定圖示的行為，您也可以提供滑鼠指標停留在指標上停留時顯示的加密層級的工具提示。To mimic the behavior of the lock icon in Internet Explorer, you can also provide a ToolTip that shows the encryption level when the mouse pointer hovers over the indicator. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`WebBrowser1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `WebBrowser1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 您可以使用方法，以實作**回**按鈕類似 Internet Explorer 中，這可讓您返回上一頁巡覽記錄中的使用者。You can use the method to implement a **Back** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer, which will allow your users to return to a previous page in the navigation history. 使用屬性來判斷是否可瀏覽歷程記錄，同時包含前一頁。Use the property to determine whether the navigation history is available and contains a previous page. 處理接收通知的事件時屬性值變更。Handle the event to receive a notification when the property value changes. 處理此事件很有用，例如，若要變更的啟用的狀態**回**按鈕時控制項巡覽至或離開巡覽記錄的開頭。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Back** button when the control navigates to or leaves the beginning of the navigation history. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以實作**回**按鈕類似 Internet Explorer 中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Back** button for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和控制項稱為`backButton`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `backButton`. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 您可以使用方法，以實作**向前**類似於 Internet Explorer 中，可讓使用者之後向後巡覽至巡覽記錄中下一頁傳回一個 按鈕。You can use the method to implement a **Forward** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer, allowing your users to return to the next page in the navigation history after navigating backward. 使用屬性來判斷是否瀏覽歷程記錄可用，及包含在目前的頁面。Use the property to determine whether the navigation history is available and contains a page located after the current one. 處理接收通知的事件時屬性值變更。Handle the event to receive a notification when the property value changes. 處理此事件很有用，例如，若要變更的啟用的狀態**向前**按鈕時控制項巡覽至或離開巡覽記錄的結尾。Handling this event is useful, for example, to change the enabled state of a **Forward** button when the control navigates to or leaves the end of the navigation history. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以實作**向前**按鈕類似 Internet Explorer 中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Forward** button for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和控制項稱為`ButtonForward`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonForward`. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). span.span: Navigates the control to the default search page of the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來實作類似 Internet Explorer 中的搜尋功能。You can use this method to implement a search feature similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 根據安裝 Internet Explorer 版本，使用者可以指定預設搜尋網頁中的**網際網路選項**對話方塊中，可從控制台或**工具**功能表Internet Explorer。Depending on the version of Internet Explorer installed, the user can specify a default search page in the **Internet Options** dialog box, which is available from Control Panel or from the **Tools** menu in Internet Explorer. 預設的 [搜尋] 頁面會儲存在登錄中`HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Internet Explorer\Main\Search Page`登錄機碼。The default search page is stored in the registry under the `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Internet Explorer\Main\Search Page` registry key. 與更新版本的 Internet Explorer 中，此登錄機碼必須經過修改才能變更這個方法所使用的預設搜尋網頁。With later versions of Internet Explorer, this registry key must be modified in order to change the default search page used by this method. 若要使用非預設的 [搜尋] 頁面，請呼叫方法，或指定屬性。To use a search page other than the default, call the method or specify the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以實作**搜尋**按鈕類似 Internet Explorer 中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Search** button for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和控制項稱為`ButtonSearch`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonSearch`. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，控制項會顯示捷徑功能表，當使用者將其上按一下滑鼠右鍵。By default, the control displays a shortcut menu when a user right-clicks it. 當您使用控制項做為一般的瀏覽器時，此行為是很有用。This behavior is useful when you use the control as a generic browser. 如果您想要隱藏的事實，您使用控制項，例如若要建立緊密結合了網頁型控制項與 Windows Form 控制項，使用者介面設定屬性設定為 false。If you want to conceal the fact that you are using the control, for example to create a user interface that seamlessly combines Web-based controls with Windows Forms controls, set the property to false. 您可以藉由設定停用其他標準瀏覽器功能和屬性為 false。You can disable other standard browser features by setting the and properties to false. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 當您呼叫這個多載，控制項巡覽至指定的 URI，並將它加入歷程記錄清單的結尾。When you call this overload, the control navigates to the specified URI and adds it to the end of the history list. 使用將控制權交還給巡覽記錄中的上一頁的方法。Use the method to return the control to a previous page in the navigation history. 使用之後若要返回稍後出現的頁面巡覽記錄中向後巡覽方法。Use the method to return to a later page in the navigation history after navigating backward. 控制儲存在本機硬碟上的快取最近瀏覽網站的網站。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每個頁面可以指定到期日，指出它將保留多久快取中。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 當控制項巡覽至網頁時，它會顯示快取的版本，如果有的話，而不會再次下載網頁節省時間。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用方法，以強制重新載入目前頁面，下載並，確保控制項顯示的最新版本的控制項。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version. 您可以使用方法來實作類似 Internet explorer 網址列。You can use the method to implement an address bar similar to the one in Internet Explorer.

Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以實作網址列控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement an address bar for the control. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`、控制項稱為`TextBoxAddress`，和控制項稱為`ButtonGo`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`, a control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a control called `ButtonGo`. 當您在文字方塊中輸入的 URL 和按下 ENTER 或按一下**移** 按鈕，控制項巡覽至指定的 URL。When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the control navigates to the URL specified. 當您按一下超連結巡覽時，文字方塊中會自動更新以顯示目前的 URL。When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). summary.span: 將指定的統一資源定位器 (URL) 處的文件載入至新瀏覽器視窗或 控制項。

span.span: Loads the document at the specified Uniform Resource Locator (URL) into a new browser window or into the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 當您呼叫具有這個多載`newWindow`參數值的`false`，控制項通常會巡覽至指定的 URI，並將 URI 新增至歷程記錄清單的結尾。When you call this overload with a `newWindow` parameter value of `false`, the control navigates to the specified URI normally and adds the URI to the end of the history list. 當您呼叫具有這個多載`newWindow`參數值的`true`、控制項將位於指定 URI 的文件載入到新的 Internet Explorer 視窗，以維護自己的瀏覽歷程記錄。When you call this overload with a `newWindow` parameter value of `true`, the control loads the document at the specified URI into a new Internet Explorer window, which maintains its own navigation history. 您可以處理事件，以接收通知之前開啟新的瀏覽器視窗時，可讓您取消動作，如有必要。You can handle the event to receive notification before a new browser window is opened, allowing you to cancel the action if necessary. 控制儲存在本機硬碟上的快取最近瀏覽網站的網站。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每個頁面可以指定到期日，指出它將保留多久快取中。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 當控制項巡覽至頁面或頁面載入不同的瀏覽器視窗時，它會顯示快取的版本，如果有的話，而不會再次下載網頁節省時間。When the control navigates to a page or loads a page into a separate browser window, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用方法，以強制重新載入目前頁面，下載並，確保控制項顯示的最新版本的控制項。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version. 當網頁載入不同的 Internet Explorer 視窗時，使用者就可以擷取最新版本，即可**重新整理** 按鈕。When a page is loaded into a separate Internet Explorer window, the user can retrieve the latest version by clicking the **Refresh** button.

summary.span: 將指定之統一資源定位器 (URL) 處的文件載入至 控制項，會使用指定的名稱來取代網頁框架的內容。

span.span: Loads the document at the specified Uniform Resource Locator (URL) into the control, replacing the contents of the Web page frame with the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 當您呼叫這個多載，控制項指定之 uri 的文件載入網頁框架具有指定名稱，並將 URI 新增至歷程記錄清單的結尾。When you call this overload, the control loads the document at the specified URI into the Web page frame with the specified name, and adds the URI to the end of the history list. 如果指定的框架名稱無效，文件會載入到新的 Internet Explorer 視窗。If the frame name specified is invalid, the document is loaded into a new Internet Explorer window. 使用將控制權交還給巡覽記錄中的上一頁的方法。Use the method to return the control to a previous page in the navigation history. 使用之後若要返回稍後出現的頁面巡覽記錄中向後巡覽方法。Use the method to return to a later page in the navigation history after navigating backward. 控制儲存在本機硬碟上的快取最近瀏覽網站的網站。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每個頁面可以指定到期日，指出它將保留多久快取中。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 當控制項巡覽至網頁時，它會顯示快取的版本，如果有的話，而不會再次下載網頁節省時間。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用方法，以強制重新載入目前頁面，下載並，確保控制項顯示的最新版本的控制項。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version.

summary.span: 發生於 控制項已巡覽至新文件且已開始載入新文件時。

span.span: Occurs when the control has navigated to a new document and has begun loading it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項巡覽至新的文件已設定其中一個的下列屬性或方法呼叫時：The control navigates to a new document whenever one of the following properties is set or methods is called: - - - - - - - - 處理接收通知的事件時控制項已巡覽至新的文件。Handle the event to receive notification when the control has navigated to a new document. 當事件發生時，新的文件已開始載入，這表示您可以存取透過載入的內容， ，和屬性。When the event occurs, the new document has begun loading, which means you can access the loaded content through the , , and properties. 處理接收通知的事件時控制項完成載入新文件。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes loading the new document. 您也可以瀏覽開始處理之前收到通知事件。You can also receive notification before navigation begins by handling the event. 處理此事件可讓您取消巡覽，如果不符合特定條件，例如，使用者有不完整填寫表單。Handling this event lets you cancel navigation if certain conditions have not been met, for example, the user has not completely filled out a form. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式事件以實作網址列控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to implement an address bar for the control. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`、控制項稱為`TextBoxAddress`，和控制項稱為`ButtonGo`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`, a control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a control called `ButtonGo`. 當您在文字方塊中輸入的 URL 和按下 ENTER 或按一下**移** 按鈕，控制項巡覽至指定的 URL。When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the control navigates to the URL specified. 當您按一下超連結巡覽時，文字方塊中會自動更新以顯示目前的 URL。When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/VB/form1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 發生於 控制項巡覽至新文件之前。

span.span: Occurs before the control navigates to a new document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項巡覽至新的文件已設定其中一個的下列屬性或方法呼叫時：The control navigates to a new document whenever one of the following properties is set or methods is called: - - - - - - - - 您可以處理取消瀏覽，如果特定條件未符合，比方說，當使用者已無法完整填寫表單的事件。You can handle the event to cancel navigation if certain conditions have not been met, for example, when the user has not completely filled out a form. 若要取消瀏覽，設定屬性物件傳遞至事件處理常式`true`。To cancel navigation, set the property of the object passed to the event handler to `true`. 您也可以使用這個物件擷取的 URL，透過新的文件的屬性。You can also use this object to retrieve the URL of the new document through the property. 如果新的文件將會顯示在網頁上的畫面，您可以擷取透過框架名稱屬性。If the new document will be displayed in a Web page frame, you can retrieve the name of the frame through the property. 處理接收通知的事件時完成瀏覽控制項，且已開始載入新的位置處的文件。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes navigation and has begun loading the document at the new location. 處理接收通知的事件時控制項完成載入新文件。Handle the event to receive notification when the control finishes loading the new document. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式事件，以取消瀏覽網頁表單未被填入。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to cancel navigation when a Web page form has not been filled in. 屬性用來判斷表單輸入的欄位是否包含值。The property is used to determine whether the form input field contains a value. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和您的表單類別具有讓存取至 com。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and that your form class has a making it accessible to COM. 完整的程式碼範例，您可以將下列程式碼貼到，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For a complete code example that you can paste the following code into, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). summary.span: 發生於開啟新瀏覽器視窗之前。

span.span: Occurs before a new browser window is opened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項開啟另一個瀏覽器視窗時的適當多載方法呼叫，或當使用者按一下**在新視窗開啟**瀏覽器快顯功能表的選項時，滑鼠指標將滑鼠停留超連結。The control opens a separate browser window when the appropriate overload of the method is called or when the user clicks the **Open in New Window** option of the browser shortcut menu when the mouse pointer hovers over a hyperlink. 您可以藉由設定停用快顯功能表屬性設定為 false。You can disable the shortcut menu by setting the property to false. 事件發生於開啟新的瀏覽器視窗之前。The event occurs before the new browser window is opened. 您可以處理此事件，例如，若要防止視窗開啟時不符合特定條件。You can handle this event, for example, to prevent the window from opening when certain conditions have not been met. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`WebBrowser1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `WebBrowser1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#651](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#651)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#651](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#651)]

summary.span: 取得或設定指令碼可存取的物件，這個指令碼包含在 控制項中所顯示的網頁內。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that can be accessed by scripting code that is contained within a Web page displayed in the control.

value.span: 可讓指令碼使用的物件。

span.span: The object being made available to the scripting code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來啟用所裝載的網頁之間的通訊控制項和應用程式，其中包含控制項。Use this property to enable communication between a Web page hosted by the control and the application that contains the control. 這個屬性可讓您整合動態 HTML (DHTML) 程式碼和用戶端應用程式程式碼。This property lets you integrate dynamic HTML (DHTML) code with your client application code. 指定這個屬性是做為網頁指令碼中使用的物件`window.external`物件，這是供主機存取的內建 DOM 物件。The object specified for this property is available to Web page script as the `window.external` object, which is a built-in DOM object provided for host access. 您可以設定任何 COM 可見物件想公用屬性和方法的指令碼使用這個的屬性。You can set this property to any COM-visible object for which you want its public properties and methods available to scripting code. 您可以讓 COM 可見的類別標示為與。You can make a class COM-visible by marking it with the . 若要呼叫您的用戶端應用程式程式碼從您網頁中定義的函式，使用方法物件，您可以從擷取屬性。To call functions defined in your Web page from your client application code, use the method of the object you can retrieve from the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 在範例中，屬性設定為目前的表單。In the example, the property is set to the current form. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ObjectForScripting/vb/form1.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

summary.span: 使用目前的列印和頁面設定，列印目前在 控制項中顯示的文件。

span.span: Prints the document currently displayed in the control using the current print and page settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來實作**列印**類似 Internet Explorer 中的按鈕。You can use this method to implement a **Print** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 這個方法會列印目前文件，而不需進一步使用者輸入。This method prints the current document without requiring further user input. 若要顯示**列印**列印，使用之前的對話方塊方法。To display the **Print** dialog box prior to printing, use the method. 若要顯示**版面**對話方塊中，可以讓使用者指定使用的頁首和頁尾值和其他的頁面設定方法。To display the **Page Setup** dialog box, which lets your users specify header and footer values and other page settings, use the method. 若要顯示**預覽列印**對話方塊中，使用方法。To display the **Print Preview** dialog box, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以實作**列印**按鈕類似的控制項**列印**Internet Explorer 中的按鈕。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Print** button for the control that is similar to the **Print** button in Internet Explorer. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和控制項稱為`ButtonPrint`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonPrint`. span.span: Occurs when the control has updated information on the download progress of a document it is navigating to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個事件處理常式來實作類似 Internet Explorer 中瀏覽進度列。You can use a handler for this event to implement a navigation progress bar similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 使用屬性來判斷已成功下載的位元組數目。Use the property to determine the number of bytes that have been downloaded successfully. 使用屬性來判斷可供下載的位元組總數。Use the property to determine the total number of bytes available for downloading. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`WebBrowser1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `WebBrowser1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 檢查伺服器的更新版本，以重新載入目前在 控制項中顯示的文件。

span.span: Reloads the document currently displayed in the control by checking the server for an updated version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制儲存在本機硬碟上的快取最近瀏覽網站的網站。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每個頁面可以指定到期日，指出它將保留多久快取中。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 當控制項巡覽至網頁時，它會顯示快取的版本，如果有的話，而不會再次下載網頁節省時間。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 方法強制重新載入目前頁面，下載並，確保控制項顯示的最新版本的控制項。The method forces the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version. 您可以使用這個方法來實作**重新整理**類似 Internet Explorer 中的按鈕。You can use this method to implement a **Refresh** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer. > [!NOTE] > 文件重新整理只會重新載入目前的頁面上，所以， ，和事件呼叫時不會發生方法。A document refresh simply reloads the current page, so the , , and events do not occur when you call the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以實作**重新整理**按鈕類似 Internet Explorer 中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Refresh** button for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和控制項稱為`ButtonRefresh`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonRefresh`. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制儲存在本機硬碟上的快取最近瀏覽的網頁。The control stores recently visited Web pages in a cache on the local hard disk. 每個頁面可以指定到期日，指出它將保留多久快取中。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 當控制項巡覽至網頁時，它會顯示快取的版本，如果有的話，而不會再次下載網頁節省時間。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 方法強制重新載入目前頁面的控制項。The method forces the control to reload the current page. 重新載入的類型取決於指定值。The type of reload depends on the value specified. 如果您呼叫方法下載文件的最新版本的值。If you call the method with the value, the latest version of the document is downloaded. 如果您使用下載最新版本的值，只有當目前的文件已過期。If you use the value, the latest version is downloaded only if the current document has expired. 如果您使用值，伺服器會傳送一份文件儲存在它自己的快取。If you use the value, the server sends a copy of the document stored in its own cache. > [!NOTE] > 文件重新整理只會重新載入目前的頁面上，所以， ，和事件呼叫時不會發生方法。A document refresh simply reloads the current page, so the , , and events do not occur when you call the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`false`偵錯您在中顯示的網頁控制項。Set this property to `false` to debug Web pages that you display in the control. 當您使用控制項將網頁控制項和指令碼的程式碼加入至您的應用程式時，這非常有用。This is useful when you use the control to add Web-based controls and scripting code to your application. 它不是很有用做為一般的瀏覽器使用的控制項時。It is less useful when you use the control as a generic browser. 當您完成偵錯您的應用程式，這個屬性設定為`true`隱藏指令碼錯誤。When you have finished debugging your application, set this property to `true` to suppress script errors. > [!NOTE] > 當設`true`、控制隱藏所有其對話方塊是來自基礎 ActiveX 控制項，不只是指令碼錯誤。When is set to `true`, the control hides all its dialog boxes that originate from the underlying ActiveX control, not just script errors. 有時候您可能需要隱藏指令碼錯誤時顯示對話方塊，例如所使用的瀏覽器安全性設定和使用者登入。Occasionally you might need to suppress script errors while displaying dialog boxes such as those used for browser security settings and user login. 在此案例中，設定至`false`和隱藏指令碼錯誤處理常式中的事件。In this case, set to `false` and suppress script errors in a handler for the event. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題的程式碼範例。For more information, see the code example in this topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何隱藏指令碼錯誤，而不隱藏其他對話方塊。The following code example demonstrates how to suppress script errors without suppressing other dialog boxes. 在範例中，屬性設定為`false`以確保會顯示對話方塊。In the example, the property is set to `false` to ensure that dialog boxes are displayed. 處理常式事件會抑制的錯誤。A handler for the event suppresses the error. 當完成文件時，才可存取此事件載入，所以此處理常式附加在事件處理常式。This event is only accessible when a document is finished loading, so the handler is attached in a event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來實作**預覽列印**類似在 Internet Explorer 的功能表項目**檔案**功能表。You can use this method to implement a **Print Preview** menu item similar to the one on the Internet Explorer **File** menu. 這個方法會顯示**預覽列印**對話方塊，讓使用者查看如何顯示目前的文件列印時的外觀。This method displays the **Print Preview** dialog box, letting users see how the current document will appear if it is printed. 若要讓使用者指定版面設定列印之前，使用方法。To let your users specify page settings prior to printing, use the method. 若要列印目前文件，請使用方法或方法。To print the current document, use the method or the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以實作**預覽列印**類似在 Internet Explorer 的功能表選項**檔案**功能表。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Print Preview** menu option similar to the one on the Internet Explorer **File** menu. 這個範例需要您的表單包含功能表與功能表項目稱為`MenuItemFilePrintPreview`。This example requires that your form contains a menu with a menu item called `MenuItemFilePrintPreview`. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來實作**屬性**類似在 Internet Explorer 的功能表選項**檔案**功能表。You can use this method to implement a **Properties** menu option similar to the one on the Internet Explorer **File** menu. 這個方法會顯示**屬性**對話方塊，其中包含目前的文件，例如類型、 URL、 大小，以及建立和修改日期的相關資訊。This method displays the **Properties** dialog box, which contains information about the current document such as its type, URL, size, and dates of creation and modification. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以實作**屬性**類似在 Internet Explorer 的功能表選項**檔案**功能表。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Properties** menu option that is similar to the one on the Internet Explorer **File** menu. 這個範例需要您的表單包含功能表與功能表項目稱為`MenuItemFileProperties`和稱為控制項 `webBrowser1.`This example requires that your form contains a menu with a menu item called `MenuItemFileProperties` and a control called `webBrowser1.` [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來實作**存**類似在 Internet Explorer 的功能表項目**檔案**功能表。You can use this method to implement a **Save As** menu item similar to the one on the Internet Explorer **File** menu. 呼叫這個方法時，會出現對話方塊取決於目前載入的文件類型。The dialog box that appears when this method is called depends on the document type currently loaded. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法可讓使用者儲存文件的內容，因為原本載入。This method allows users to save only the contents of the document as it was originally loaded. 在文件進行任何修改執行階段屬性不會保存。Any modifications made to the document at run time through the property are not persisted. 如需擷取執行階段修改的資訊，請參閱[如何： 存取 Managed HTML 文件物件模型中的 HTML 來源](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-access-the-html-source-in-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md)。For information on retrieving the run-time modifications, see [How to: Access the HTML Source in the Managed HTML Document Object Model](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-access-the-html-source-in-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以實作**存**類似在 Internet Explorer 的功能表選項**檔案**功能表。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Save As** menu option that is similar to the one on the Internet Explorer **File** menu. 這個範例需要您的表單包含功能表與功能表項目稱為`MenuItemFileSaveAs`和控制項稱為`webBrowser1`。This example requires that your form contains a menu with a menu item called `MenuItemFileSaveAs` and a control called `webBrowser1`. summary.span: 取得 控制項的狀態文字。

span.span: Gets the status text of the control.

value.span: 狀態文字。

span.span: The status text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性顯示的狀態狀態列中的控制項。You can use this property to display the status of the control in a status bar. 狀態文字變成包含資訊，例如 URL 的超連結，將滑鼠指標停留在它與目前載入文件的 URL 時的訊息。The status text is a message that contains information such as the URL of a hyperlink when the mouse pointer hovers over it and the URL of the document currently being loaded. 處理事件狀態更新列時的值屬性變更。Handle the event to update the status bar when the value of the property changes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來實作狀態列的類似 Internet Explorer 中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to implement a status bar for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和控制項稱為`StatusBar1`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `StatusBar1`. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). summary.span: 取消任何暫止的巡覽，並停止任何動態頁面項目 (例如背景聲音和動畫)。

span.span: Cancels any pending navigation and stops any dynamic page elements, such as background sounds and animations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用方法，以實作**停止**類似 Internet Explorer 中的按鈕。You can use the method to implement a **Stop** button similar to the one in Internet Explorer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以實作**停止**按鈕類似 Internet Explorer 中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to implement a **Stop** button for the control similar to the one in Internet Explorer. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`和控制項稱為`ButtonStop`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1` and a control called `ButtonStop`. 完整的程式碼範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ Url { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前文件的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the current document.

value.span: ，代表目前文件的 URL。

span.span: A representing the URL of the current document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性就相當於呼叫方法，並將其傳遞指定的 URL。Setting this property is equivalent to calling the method and passing it the specified URL. 控制會維護所有瀏覽工作階段期間的網頁瀏覽歷程記錄清單。The control maintains a history list of all the Web pages visited during a browsing session. 當您將屬性，控制項巡覽至指定的 URL，並將它加入歷程記錄清單的結尾。When you set the property, the control navigates to the specified URL and adds it to the end of the history list. 控制儲存在本機硬碟上的快取最近瀏覽網站的網站。The control stores Web pages from recently visited sites in a cache on the local hard disk. 每個頁面可以指定到期日，指出它將保留多久快取中。Each page can specify an expiration date indicating how long it will remain in the cache. 當控制項巡覽至網頁時，它會顯示快取的版本，如果有的話，而不會再次下載網頁節省時間。When the control navigates to a page, it saves time by displaying a cached version, if one is available, rather than downloading the page again. 使用方法，以強制重新載入目前頁面，下載並，確保控制項顯示的最新版本的控制項。Use the method to force the control to reload the current page by downloading it, ensuring that the control displays the latest version. > [!NOTE] > 即使已要求另一個文件，這個屬性會包含目前的文件的 URL。This property contains the URL of the current document, even if another document has been requested. 如果您設定這個屬性的值，然後立即擷取一次擷取的值可能會與設定如果的值不同控制項在何時未於載入新文件的時間。If you set the value of this property and then immediately retrieve it again, the value retrieved may be different than the value set if the control has not had time to load the new document. 您可以擷取中的新值事件處理常式。You can retrieve the new value in a event handler. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來實作網址列控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to implement an address bar for the control. 這個範例需要您的表單包含控制項稱為`webBrowser1`、控制項稱為`TextBoxAddress`，和控制項稱為`ButtonGo`。This example requires that your form contains a control called `webBrowser1`, a control called `TextBoxAddress`, and a control called `ButtonGo`. 當您在文字方塊中輸入的 URL 和按下 ENTER 或按一下**移** 按鈕，控制項巡覽至指定的 URL。When you type a URL into the text box and press ENTER or click the **Go** button, the control navigates to the URL specified. 當您按一下超連結巡覽時，文字方塊中會自動更新以顯示目前的 URL。When you navigate by clicking a hyperlink, the text box automatically updates to display the current URL. summary.span: 取得已安裝的 Internet Explorer 版本。

span.span: Gets the version of Internet Explorer installed.

value.span: 物件，代表已安裝的 Internet Explorer 版本。

span.span: A object representing the version of Internet Explorer installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項是使用 Internet Explorer 一起安裝的元件的 managed 包裝函式。The control is a managed wrapper around a component installed with Internet Explorer. 使用這個屬性來判斷已安裝的 Internet Explorer 版本。Use this property to determine which version of Internet Explorer is installed. 當您的應用程式使用存在於只在特定版本的 Internet Explorer 的一項功能時，這非常有用。This is useful when your application uses a feature of Internet Explorer that is present only in certain versions. 如果不存在於本機電腦上所需的版本，您可以提供的替代功能，或提示使用者進行升級。If the required version is not present on the local machine, you can provide alternative functionality or prompt the user to upgrade.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性設為 false，則防止您的使用者使用 Internet Explorer 鍵盤快速鍵與控制項。Set this property to false to prevent your users from using Internet Explorer keyboard shortcuts with the control. 當您想要隱藏的事實，您會使用這非常有用控制項，例如若要建立緊密結合 dhtml 控制項與 Windows Form 控制項的使用者介面。This is useful when you want to conceal the fact that you are using the control, for example to create a user interface that seamlessly combines DHTML-based controls with Windows Forms controls. 您可以藉由設定停用其他標準瀏覽器功能和屬性`false`。You can disable other standard browser features by setting the and properties to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property.
